name: Good Life
content: 这时代太衰败直到你出现
Just when you're by my side
Don't even know what to do
Cause we can have the good life
像为你演奏无暇的乐章
Cause we can have the good life
不小心 飘向你的去向
Cause we can have the good life
只要你想都不算是太迟
选择你想要的方式开始
Don't even know what to do
Cause we can have the good life
像为你演奏无暇的乐章
Cause we can have the good life
Cause we can have the good life
We can have the good life
